itunes:title: Episode 640 - Reparations For North Carolina
title: Episode 640 - Reparations For North Carolina
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how news media used clickbait to misrepresent the city of Asheville, North Carolina’s move to give “reparations” to its Black citizens, Rapper Megan Thee Stallion getting shot 9 times, why The Rose Bowl Parade in 2...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss how news media used clickbait to misrepresent the city of Asheville, North Carolina’s move to give “reparations” to its Black citizens, Rapper Megan Thee Stallion getting shot 9 times, why The Rose Bowl Parade in 2021 has been completely cancelled, they explain the rumors going around of Kanye West dropping out of the Presidential Election, and Ross tells us why he is more amped to watch the debates than any other public event happening this coming Fall.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
